description_html: The Carousel Pendant [RC 42] from CL Sterling is composed of nuggets of recycled lead crystal that have been tumbled to remove sharp edges and then individually hand tied to a nickel plated brass frame using jeweler’s wire. 47.6” OAH x 23.6” Dia. A variety of glass diffuser options are offered. The fixture is suspended by silk rope covered stems. Accepts (3) 60W incandescent bulbs or equivalent. Approximately 65 lbs.
